title: STAT+: Merck suffers a setback over its new Keytruda formulation in Germany
description: In a setback for Merck, a German court issued a preliminary injunction that prevents the company from distributing a new subcutaneous formulation of Keytruda in Germany. The ruling came as…
content: In a setback for Merck, a German court issued a preliminary injunction that prevents the company from distributing a new subcutaneous formulation of Keytruda in Germany. The ruling came as…
